name: BrowserNation
overview:
BrowserNation develops creative Firefox and Chrome browser applications. The result is an exciting digital marketing and content delivery tool that’s ideal for any organization with a loyal online community.

The app doubles up as a multipurpose communication and marketing tool. It allows publishers to push their premium digital content to their target audience and funnel traffic back to their website to sell their products and services.

The product keeps them in direct digital contact with that entity all the time theyâ€™re online â€“ and it incentivizes them by delivering exciting content, up-to-the-minute news, and specific rewards.

Unlike toolbars, the BN product is an entirely customizable platform thatâ€™s designed for branding and multimedia communication purposes. This means that you the publisher â€œownâ€ the space at the top of a computer screen, enabling you to keep your brand and your message in front of your community all the time theyâ€™re online.
